thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Globe Telecom Q4 Net Income Down 57 Pct From Prior Qtr

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Globe Telecom Q4 Net Income Down 57 Pct From Prior Qtr
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Globe Telecom Inc:
* FY EBITDA ‍​ 53,326 MILLION PESOS VERSUS 49,978 MILLION PESOS A YEAR AGO
* FY SERVICE REVENUES 127.91 BILLION PESOS, UP 6 PERCENT YOY
* DECLARES 1Q18 DIVIDEND OF 22.75 PESOS PER SHARE‍​‍​ * Q4 NET INCOME 2.10BLN PESOS, DOWN 57 PERCENT ON PRIOR QUARTER
* BOARD APPROVED ADDITIONAL CAPEX OF USD100MLN, BRINGING 2017 CAPEX TO USD850MLN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
